show-exact-time.title: show the specific date and time in note navigation and note items
show-exact-time.description: show the specific date and time in note navigation and note items. if false, we will show the rough date/time distance from now.

sort-info.title: default ordering in the note items
sort-info.description: default ordering in the note items

language.title: language
language.description: Preferred language, if it is set, the language switch will be hidden.

theme.title: theme
theme.description: Preferred Theme, if this option is set, the theme switch will be hidden.

destroy-account.title: Destroy Your Account(CAN'T RECOVER)
destroy-account.description: once your account was destroyed, your data will be deleted and not able to recover
